TransactionStateContext.DepositState: When users deposit funds via the Deposit function or the fallback function.
TransactionStateContext.WithdrawalState: When users withdraw funds using the Collect function.

ExternalInteractions.Deposit: Transfers Ether from users to the contract address and logs the transaction.
ExternalInteractions.Withdraw: Transfers Ether from the contract back to the user and logs the transaction.
